Build ID: tptpaide-2007-04-05-05-00-00

Steps To Reproduce:
1.Right click on the WSDM Project and Select Import->Tooling for WSDM->Java classes as capability and Click on Next button
2.Navigates to next window, Here Select Option "Select Java classes from Jar file" and click on the relative Browse button
3."Import from File System" window comes up, Here select appropriate jar firl using Jar files Browse button (I imported ibm.jar which is attached)
4. Select WTextField class, and click OK button 
Unhandled event loop exception throws up

java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: com.rational.test.ft.object.interfaces.GuiTestObject

More information:

The better way to test this functionality is that when user selects the jar file and the perticular java class to import. He should press the Load Button for the verification of the loading of the class, because it might be possible that user didn't specify all the dependent jar files.
Saurabh please add a message to the dialog instructing user to add all required JARs before trying to load a particular class.
